channel.title: Courtesy of I Am Noob: 1314Reloaded
channel.description:
I Am Noob has asked me to post this!
[center][b][b][u][size=15pt]1314Reloaded[/size][/u][/b] [url=http://www.lukesrealm.co.uk/]Forums[/url]
[u][b]Note:[/b][/u] [i]This is always just going to be a preveiw until release![/i]
[u][b]Infomation:[/b][/u] This server is VERY stable - everything is handled!
[i][b]Things Included so far:[/b][/i]
[ul][li]Attack[/li] [li]Srength[/li] [li]Defense[/li] [li]HP[/li] [li]Range[/li] [li]Magic[/li] [li]Smelting[/li] [li]Smithing[/li] [li]Cooking[/li] [li]Fishing[/li] [li]Firemaking[/li] [li]Mining[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Note:[/b][/u] [u]ONLY and i mean ONLY combat is in client.java the rest is handled![/u]
[u][b]Pic:[/b][/u] [img]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/9931/stuffct8.png[/img] the red is what ive added!
the black is hidden!
~ more info coming soon ~
[/center]
I take no credit for this!

item.title: Courtesy of I Am Noob: 1314Reloaded
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote="-Legend-, post:14, topic:139640"][quote author=Frell link=topic=191629.msg1725693#msg1725693 date=1188764721]

no one wants to be on his nooby team so he doesnt have to do any work.

This is “how can we work together” not “ima make a team so they can do thu wurk”

Please just shut up… Your “FrellScape” was a piece of shit named changed off BlitzPk, and I am noob, did more than 95%+ of this himself.

NOW THATS POONED

I dont care. Everyone knows i hate private servers, i just wanted one with full range.

That is why you attempt dragon full helms? Skill capes?

thats clients dipshit
[/quote]

BASED AROUND 1 THING REALLY. YOU NEED A SERVER TO USE THE CLIENT, AND YOU NEED A CLIENT TO GET ON A SERVER…[/quote]
clients > servers

clients != servers.

Read full topic
